column4: hello! can someone tell me wich key to use in order to select an option in termilan xorg reconfigure?
just tell me what keyboard button to use in order to select an option, i tried all of them :/
I'm not sure what you are asking, but I'm sure the answer is probably either tab, space, or enter
or the arrow keys
can i pm you about this?
it's better if you ask here so everyone can help
ok, so... basically i love ubuntu but i have 2 problems that i cannot solve
have you followed the wiki guide to install the nvidia drivers?
what was the result?
which step are you on on the wiki?
hi again! i get stuck at step no10 i think. when nvidia writes the xorg file, the x server chrashes with this:  cant start x: api mismatch, nvidia kernel module is 1.0-9755 while xmodule is 1.0-9746
are you using the official ubuntu repositories only and installing nvidia-glx from there?
im now in recovery mode so i cant check synaptic
apt-cache policy nvidia-glx
nvidia-glx:
nvidia-glx:
yeah, you're using albertmilone's repo.  I don't know how to fix this right away.  Using 'envy' might take care of it or someone here might know more
i tried using envy but it cant find my card... and when i try manuall install it also chrashes x server
use official repositories then, that's my suggestion
ok, will do. but what now? should I uninstall something?
maybe this can help you http://doc.gwos.org/index.php/Latest_Nvidia_Edgy .  I'm just pointing you at docs because I don't have any experience here
the part about kernel upgrades will probably fix your issue
